title: What are your top 5 Albums?
body:
In no particular order, mine are: 

1. Metallica - Kill 'em All
2. Rise Against - The Sufferer and the Witness
3. Rise Against - Revolutions Per Minute
4. Faith No More - The Real Thing 
5. In Flames - The Jester Race 


What are yours? 

http://i.imgur.com/ctC1xrQ.jpg
